summary: Add debugger support for Workflow code running in v8 isolates. Currently debugging workflows is not possible, which is a critical usability gap that needs comprehensive implementation and documentation.
userImpact: Developers cannot debug workflow code, severely limiting their ability to troubleshoot and develop complex workflows.
proposedFix: Implement v8 inspector integration for isolated workflow contexts, using isolated-vm inspector example as reference.
resolutionDetails: Debugger support was implemented for workflows running in isolates.
keyQuote: Debugging Workflows should be as seamless as possible (considering the limitations when working with multiple v8 contexts).
